name: Monster War(Tower Shooting)-Shoot Game
description:
Monster clans is coming！

Angry monster clans starting the war ,they attack human castle,immediately picked up the bow to defend our world
Monster War(Tower Shooting) is a shooting monster-themed strategy game,gorgeous and fresh pictures. adorkable and cute monster，dynamic and brilliant skills. experience it for free!
Players need to control the bow or arrow shoot to monsters and using various defend towers guard the walls.
The game is easy to control,move the cursor and lock a target, just concentrate firepower to shoot, drag the bottom right corner of the skill icon to quickly release skills, a large area of attack monsters
After clearance will have the opportunity to upgrade crossbow, towers, magic skill. appropriate upgrade allows you a strong firepower
Witch in the boss mode is adept at using magic to escape, equip weapons rather go adventure!
Another surprise is ready waiting for you in bonus and VIP system
